build
  The Chromium build framework, by Google.
  BSD-style license (3-clause)
  https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src.git

base
  The Chromium base library, by Google.
  BSD-style license (3-clause)
  https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/base/trace_event/common/

buildtools
  Build tools from the Chromium library, by Google.
  BSD-style license (3-clause)
  https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/buildtools/

testing
  Chromium testing framework.
  BSD-style license (3-clause)
  https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/testing.git

third_party/boringssl/src
  BoringSSL crypto library, by Google.
  Original BSD License
  https://boringssl.googlesource.com/boringssl

third_party/curl/source
  Networking and data transfer library.
  MIT-style
  https://github.com/curl/curl

third_party/doxygen
  Documentation generator, by Free Software Foundation Inc.
  GPL license
  https://github.com/doxygen/doxygen

third_party/ffmpeg/src
  A complete, cross-platform solution to record, convert and stream audio and video.
  (varies, our config uses): GNU Lesser General Public License
  https://github.com/FFmpeg/FFmpeg

third_party/gecko/src
  Mozilla Firefox browser.
  Mozilla Public License
  https://github.com/mozilla/gecko-dev

third_party/gflags/src
  Google flag parsing library.
  BSD-style license (3-clause)
  https://github.com/gflags/gflags

third_party/glog/src
  Google logging library.
  BSD-style license (3-clause)
  https://github.com/google/glog

third_party/googletest/src
  Google's C++ Testing Framework
  BSD-style license (3-clause)
  https://chromium.googlesource.com/external/github.com/google/googletest.git

third_party/icu
  A Unicode support library, by ICU.
  ICU License
  https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/deps/icu.git

third_party/jinja2
  Template engine for code generation in Blink.
  BSD-style license (3-clause)
  https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/third_party/jinja2.git

third_party/libxml
  An XML parser, by the Gnome Project.
  MIT License
  https://gitlab.gnome.org/GNOME/libxml2

third_party/markupsafe
  Safe string class, used by Jinja2 template engine.
  BSD-style license (3-clause)
  https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/third_party/markupsafe.git

third_party/protobuf/src
  Language-neutral, platform-neutral extensible serialized structured data.
  BSD-style license (3-clause)
  https://developers.google.com/protocol-buffers

third_party/pymake
  make implementation in Python.
  MIT License
  https://github.com/mozilla/pymake

third_party/sdl2
  Simple DirectMedia Layer.
  zlib License
  https://libsdl.org

third_party/zlib/src
  A massively spiffy yet delicately unobtrusive compression library.
  BSD-style license (3-clause)
  https://github.com/madler/zlib

src/v8
  The JavaScript engine that Chrome uses, by Google.
  BSD-style license (3-clause)
  https://chromium.googlesource.com/v8/v8.git
